sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"演员"之意
means: actor ：指在舞台剧、电影、电视剧或广播剧中以演出为职业的男演员，侧重扮演的角色。
player ：侧重指职业或业余舞台演员。
performer ：使用广泛，不仅可指舞台或影视演员，而且可指舞蹈演员、乐器演奏等的演员，侧重在观众面前的实际表演。

sentence.Network_en: Until 1987, Canada's industry had been the star performer.
sentence.Network_cn: 直到1987年，加拿大的工业一直成就斐然。

sentence.Network_en: She was no mean performer on a variety of other instruments.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多别的乐器她也演奏得相当出色。

sentence.Network_en: A performer in evening dress plays classical selections on the violin.
sentence.Network_cn: 一名身穿晚礼服的表演者用小提琴演奏了几段古典音乐。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 高一英语单词表 - 豆丁网 ... instrument n 工具；器械 performer n 表演者 △ rhythm n 节奏；韵律.
八年级上册英语单词表（人教版）_百度知道 ... talent show 才艺表演 performer 表演者；演员 success 成功.

新东方王雷老师场景词汇笔记 - 豆丁网 ... leading actor 主要演员 performer 演出者，艺人 negative character 反面人物.

list.abs: Slinda的博客 - slinda - 网易博客 ... (1) 体积( size) (2) 性能( performance) (3) 功能( functionality).
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... perform v 执行（任务）；表演 performance n 表现；表演 fraction n 部分；小片，分数.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... uniformity n 一致性 perform v 执行（任务）；表演 performance n 表现；表演.
个人简历英文翻译词汇大全_百度文库 ... perfect 使完善；改善 perform 执行，履行 plan 计划.

entry.def: A performer is a person who acts, sings, or does other entertainment in front of audiences.

example.ex: A performer in evening dress plays classical selections on the violin.
example.tran: 一名身穿晚礼服的表演者用小提琴演奏了几段古典音乐。

entry.tran: 表现…的人（或事物）；性能…的事物
entry.def: You can use performer when describing someone or something in a way that indicates how well they do a particular thing.

example.ex: Until 1987, Canada's industry had been the star performer...
example.tran: 直到1987年，加拿大的工业一直成就斐然。

example.ex: He is a world class performer.
example.tran: 他是位世界级的表演者。

means.word_mean: 1. an entertainer who performs a dramatic or musical work for an audience

auth_sentence.content: He's been a really consistent performer for us.
auth_sentence.res_content: He's been a really consistent performer for us.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He's been a really consistent performer for us.

auth_sentence.content: Shes not a singer, shes not a performer.
auth_sentence.res_content: Shes not a singer, shes not a performer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Shes not a singer, shes not a performer.

auth_sentence.content: Delaney an effective performer rather than a stand-up sensation.
auth_sentence.res_content: Delaney an effective performer rather than a stand-up sensation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Delaney an effective performer rather than a stand-up sensation.

sentences.cn: 她是富有经验的音乐会演奏家。

sentences.en: His recitals have earned him recognition as a talented performer.
sentences.cn: 他的演奏会使他赢得了天才演奏家的赞誉。

sentences.en: He was supposed to be a serious performer,but the crowd laughed him off the stage.
sentences.cn: 他被认为是严肃的表演者,但观众却把他轰下了台。
